00030     template <> void compressed_matrix<float, 4>::init()
00031     {
00032      static bool init_done = false;
00033      if (!init_done)
00034      {
00035        std::string source;
00036        viennacl::ocl::program prog;
00037        source.append(compressed_matrix_align1_lu_forward);
00038        source.append(compressed_matrix_align1_lu_backward);
00039        source.append(compressed_matrix_align4_vec_mul);
00040        prog.create(source);
00041 
00042        lu_forward.prepareInit("lu_forward", prog);
00043        lu_backward.prepareInit("lu_backward", prog);
00044        vec_mul.prepareInit("vec_mul", prog);
00045        init_done = true;
00046      }
00047     }
